item.name: Repair a whole square!
hint.auto.ReturnRatherThanEnd: Use 'return' rather than 'end' or Robo will not continue with the next procedure!
hint.auto.notAllPotholesFilled: Ok! No problem that not all potholes were filled yet. Robo did not run until the end, because this may take a very long time and we did not want to keep you waiting. Try again and/or make your program smarter to see if Robo fills more potholes this time.
